dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Who dares to disturb the domain of the Sky Guardian!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking guidance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Guidance? You are nothing but an intruder. What do you seek?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge of this land's history.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: History is irrelevant to me. Begone, or face the consequences!
Wise decision. Leave now and never return.
You seek death then? So be it!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek your wisdom and power to aid me in my quest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My power is not to be trifled with. What makes you think you are worthy?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my intrusion. I will depart.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your apology does not erase your trespass. Leave now!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am a warrior seeking a strong ally. Join me in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You may be brave, but foolish. Prepare to face the might of the Sky Guardian!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge your authority.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from an insignificant creature. State your purpose!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel for control of this territory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You seek to challenge me? You shall regret your arrogance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my disrespect. I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies do not change the disrespect you've shown. Leave at once!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Let us settle this with a battle to prove who is stronger!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare for the wrath of the Sky Guardian!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to form an alliance with you. Together, we can rule this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance with the Sky Guardian? You overestimate your worth. Prepare for a lesson in humility!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for my arrogance. I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words do not erase your insolence. Leave now and spare yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to a duel to prove my strength and worthiness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You have sealed your fate with your arrogance. Face the wrath of the Sky Guardian!
